title.rendered: Gottwals Books Wins Best of the Best for Macon and Warner Robins

content.rendered: Thank you to our wonderful customers for voting us Best of the Best for Macon and Warner Robins this year. We could not have done it without you! We appreciate all you do for us and your dedication to our company! Our customers deserve a Best of the Best award as well! Visit your nearest Gottwals Books location to celebrate this achievement with us and check out our new inventory coming in everyday.
